name: Eye The Campfire
description:
Eye The Campfire is a short game, where you have to collect logs and bring them to the campfire to make sure it stays lit up, while also managing your hunger.

Controls:

Left mouse button - Click to move

Right mouse button - Collect

Middle mouse button - Light up a torch

Tips:

Don't put too many logs into the campfire

Your hunger doesn't have to be at 20 to heal you
